info.title: How to Play
info.step1: Place a bottle in the center and arrange the deck of cards around it in a circle as shown in the image.
info.step2: Decide who starts and which direction the game will go.
info.step3: On your turn, draw a card and show it. Check the card instructions in the app (the suit doesn’t matter, only the number) and place the card on top of the bottle in the center. Then the next player continues.
info.step4: The game ends when there is a gap in the circle of cards or the stack on top of the bottle falls. In that case, the last player who touched the cards must take a forfeit.

waterfall.name: Waterfall
waterfall.description: The player who drew the card starts drinking. Everyone drinks with them until they decide to stop.

choose_drinker.name: Pick a Drinker
choose_drinker.description: Choose a player who must take a set number of sips.

girls_drink.name: Girls Drink
girls_drink.description: All the girls take a drink.

thumb_master.name: Thumb Master
thumb_master.description: You are the Thumb Master. At any time, place your thumb on the table and everyone must follow. The last person to do so drinks.

boys_drink.name: Boys Drink
boys_drink.description: All the boys take a drink.

finger_sky.name: Sky Point
finger_sky.description: You are the Sky Point Master. At any time, point to the sky and say 'piu'—everyone must copy you. The last person to do it drinks.

slave.name: The Slave
slave.description: Choose someone to be your slave. Whenever you drink, they must drink too.

rhyme.name: Rhyme Time
rhyme.description: Pick a word. Going in turn, everyone must say a word that rhymes with it. Anyone who can’t think of one drinks.

category.name: Category
category.description: Choose a category. Going in turn, everyone must name something from that category. Anyone who can’t think of one drinks.

all_drink.name: Everyone Drinks
all_drink.description: Everyone drinks! Choose how many sips.

ghost.name: The Ghost
ghost.description: Everyone must ignore you until someone else becomes the Ghost. If anyone talks to you before that, they drink.

new_rule.name: New Rule
new_rule.description: Create a new rule that everyone must follow for the rest of the game.
